snippet: Israel’s aerial bombardment of Gaza continued Sunday, as did rocket fire into Israel, as Israeli leaders and Palestinian militants both appeared ready to continue and escalate the conflict.
abstract: Several thousand Palestinians flee areas in northern Gaza after Israel warns them of major attacks to come, despite urgings by Hamas to remain in their homes; both Israel and Hamas seem to signal little public interest in international appeals for cease-fire.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Steven Erlanger reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem. Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza, and Kareem Fahim and Merna Thomas from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: Israel’s aerial bombardment of Gaza continued Sunday, as did rocket fire into Israel, as Israeli leaders and Palestinian militants both appeared ready to continue and escalate the conflict.

headline.main: Palestinians Flee Northern Gaza as a Cease-Fire Appears Elusive
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Flee Northern Gaza as a Cease-Fire Appears Elusive
